import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import Axios from "axios"; import UserImg from "../../Assests/Images/user/sha.jpeg"; import CoverImg from "../../Assests/Images/background/bg-1.png"; import CoverVideo from "../../Assests/Videos/1.mp4"; import { Container, Row, Col, Collapse } from "react-bootstrap"; import { BsClockFill, BsThreeDotsVertical, BsFlag, BsTrash, BsPencilSquare, } from "react-icons/bs"; import { FaThumbsUp, FaComments, FaShare } from "react-icons/fa"; function Posts(props) { const userID = props.postOwnerID; if (props.postCompany === 1 ) { var postCompanyLink = "/partner/" + props.postCompanyName.toLowerCase().trim().split(/\s+/).join('-'); } const [viewProfile, setViewProfile] = useState("avatar/male.svg"); useEffect(() => { Axios.get( `${process.env.REACT_APP_SERVER_DOMAIN}/home/userProfile/` + userID ).then((response) => { const profileDetail1 = response.data[0]; const profileDetail2 = response.data[1]; var profile; if (profileDetail1.length === 0) { if (profileDetail2[0].gender === "Male") { profile = `${process.env.REACT_APP_SERVER_DOMAIN}/public/Assests/Images/avatar/male.svg`; setViewProfile(profile); } else { profile = `${process.env.REACT_APP_SERVER_DOMAIN}/public/Assests/Images/avatar/female.svg`; setViewProfile(profile); } } else { profile = `${process.env.REACT_APP_SERVER_DOMAIN}/public/Assests/Images/user/` + profileDetail1[0].profile_photo; setViewProfile(profile); } }); }, [userID]); const [open, setOpen] = useState(false); const test = (event) => { alert("Click on button Option here"); }; return (

{props.postCompany === 1 ? {props.postCompanyName} : {props.postUserName} }

{/* 10th June 2021 5:14 pm */} {props.postTime}

Like {/* */} setOpen(!open)} aria-expanded={open} aria-controls="collapseID" role="button" > Comment Share
